data.title: Reliable file systems & data storage management software
data.meta_description: Tuxera creates quality-assured embedded file systems, data storage, flash management, and networking software, keeping your data accessible & uncorrupted.
data.text:
Meet us at SC24, the International Conference for high-performance computing, networking, storage, and analysis!

November 17-22 - Atlanta, GA

Let's connect

High-performance, reliable data management for a data-driven world

That is our promise to you. From the moment you first reach out to us and throughout your experience with Tuxera, we strive in everything we do to uphold that promise. How can we help you?

Talk to an expert

"Fusion File Share by Tuxera is truly a game-changer for content producers needing extreme performance and advanced workflow management capabilities."

Nick Elvester, Vice President of Product Operations, Quantum

Quantum & Tuxera: a technical partnership

Meet the Persistence Manager by Tuxera – a groundbreaking feature for our exFAT implementation that boosts data resilience and power fail-safety

Introduced at Embedded World 2024, our new feature for Microsoft exFAT by Tuxera is a smarter, more cost-effective way to safeguard essential data in embedded systems

Find out more

Embedded storage and software

Reliable file systems, flash management, and network software

Our embedded solutions

Enterprise file & data access software

High-performance SMB and network file systems that scale with you

More about our enterprise solutions

Chosen and backed by the industry's best

The Tuxera difference

Our passion is protecting data integrity and longevity, while ensuring seamless data transfer and access all the way from the edge to the cloud. Tuxera’s software is renowned for boosting throughput, cutting file seek time, reducing boot time, and preventing data corruption. But what we’re really known for is our dedication to developing quality-assured software, our responsive technical support, and unparalleled development expertise in storage management and connectivity software.

Customer case studies

The world counts on us for data storage management and network software

Our storage management and networking software powers billions of devices, cars, and public cloud platforms around the world, bringing people closer to all the data they store, use, and share. Tuxera’s customers include car makers, device manufacturers, industrial equipment manufacturers, data-driven enterprises, and many more. We help them solve complex challenges involving data in all its states – at rest, in use, and in motion. They rely on our software to protect data integrity, ensure data accessibility, improve storage performance, transfer data rapidly and securely, and extend flash memory lifetime.

More about us
